data.title: Learn about how we make cloud zeros into cloud heroes
data.text:
OUR MISSION

Our Mission is to simplify cloud security so technology and security professionals can secure the cloud like an expert.

OUR VISION

Users of every skill level have intelligence that’s accessible, actionable, and explorable because we have more information on cloud adversaries and tactics than anyone, and we made it usable by everyone.

Paul Nguyen

Co-Founder, Co-CEO

25+ years in security from white hat hacker at @stake (Symantec) and Neohapsis (Cisco) to godfather of Security Orchestration with Invotas (FireEye). Recovering public security company exec (SVP of Product Strategy and Product Management).

My favorite dessert is Rita’s Gelatis and it puts all other desserts on this list to shame.

Ian Ahl

SVP of Threat Research

20+ years of experience starting in the USMC, 8 Years Mandiant IR and Advanced Practices: tracking, detecting, and responding to nation state threat actors.

My favorite dessert is warm dark chocolate brownies with vanilla ice cream and some chocolate drizzle!

Sanjeev Williams

VP of Product Management

Product leader with experience launching game-changing products, building customer-centric teams and scaling organizations of all sizes. Former Arctic Wolf, FireEye, Invotas. Most recently oversaw all CloudSec products at Rapid7.

My favorite dessert are Buckeyes and Rainbow Cookies. Anything with Dark Chocolate.

John Filitz

Sr. Product Marketing Manager

I’m a researcher at the core that found my niche in cybersecurity and product marketing. I have worked in multiple sectors where I have lead GTM and strategic research efforts. My experience includes working at multiple cybersecurity startups, a VAR, think tanks and government.

My favorite dessert is creme brulee.

Silvio Pappalardo

VP of Sales

30 years of combined global experience in executive leadership, sales management, cybersecurity sales, and US federal law enforcement as a Special Agent. Former QuintessenceLabs (CRO), Absolute Software (VP Strategic, Federal & NetMotion Americas), FireEye, Invotas (VP Sales & Marketing), RSA/NetWitness

My favorite dessert is cannoli’s from Carlo’s Bake Shop in Hoboken, NJ - NOTHING else even comes close.

Tobin Sears

VP of Sales Engineering

20+ years in cybersecurity. Focused on delivering value to customers through the application of emergent and differentiated technologies.

My favorite dessert are eclairs. Not the whip cream filled. Must have custard and must be from France!

Michael Ferrari

Regional Sales Manager, West

I am a Bay Area native with a passion for closing deals at cyber security startups. I love the early stage feel that a company has, where it’s us against the world and every product update, event, deal, hire feels so consequential. I attended the University of Oregon (Go Ducks), and in my spare time, you can find me hiking, gaming, watching sports, playing pickleball, enjoying docs/movies, or prospecting ;)

My favorite dessert is Key Lime Pie

Milan Gavran

Regional Sales Manager, Central

20+ years of successful enterprise cybersecurity sales. A native of Chicago I enjoy working with my partners, colleagues, friends and previous customers to help solve relevant problems with unique technologies. Happily married for 29 years + two college-grad kids just starting their careers.

Not a fan of dessert as I usually eat too much during the meal!

Thomas Kurty

Staff Software Engineer

8 years of software development experience in a variety of languages and frameworks, designing everything from low-level drivers and controls to cloud infrastructure and security.

My favorite dessert is affogato, the perfectly indulgent combination of coffee and cream.

Nihar Patel

Senior Software Engineer

5 years of introducing silly bugs in mostly the frontend of web apps ranging from HR management, finance and security.

My favorite dessert is Adadiya. It tastes sweet and spicy, and is made of black gram, ghee and nuts. Don’t think it’s a dessert though, you’d normally eat it in the morning in winter, but it’s sweet so it counts.

Mayank Singh

Senior Software Engineer

More than 6 years of multi domain experience as a Front End developer in companies like Amdocs, FireEye and Amazon, having deep interest in software as well as hardware technologies. Gadgets and Video game lover.

My favorite dessert ever is RasMalai. Keep them coming…

Enrique Santeliz

Software Engineer

~6 years of experience, you’ll find me usually in the backend, doing servers and infra. I’m also great at introducing bugs in the frontend (also in the backend.)

My favorite dessert is Strawberry cheesecake (always).

Nathan Eades

Senior Threat Researcher

RMU B.S. CIS, RMU M.S. InfoSec, 8+ years in IT with roles in software development, cybersecurity consulting, data loss prevention, threat detection and threat research

I cannot insult the other desserts by choosing one.

Bleon Proko

Threat Researcher

4 years on IT and cyber security working in Telecommunication, MSP, and Bank.

I tend to not eat sweets, but if I had to choose, trilece.

Guido Besomi

Data Scientist

I’m a mathematical engineer from Universidad de Chile. When I started my data science journey I was a mathematician more than anything else, after 6 years of working on applied problems I’m proud to say I’ve earned the “engineering” part of my degree.

My favorite dessert is crème brûlée.
